officialTitle: Impact of Colchicine Therapy on Arrhythmia Recurrence After Acute Pericardial Effusion Following Catheter Ablation of Atrial Fibrillation
inclusionCriteria: * Patients needed to pericardiocentesis during RFCA for paroxysmal or persistent atrial fibrillation.
exclusionCriteria:
* Hypersensitivity on Colchicine
* The existence of intra-cardiac thrombus on trans-esophageal echocardiography
* Pregnancy
